afk.description: Toggle Away from Keyboard and customize AFK message.
afk.modal_content: Enter a custom Away From Keyboard [AFK] message here

autocomplete.description: Toggle autocompleting emojis and emotes.  Shows a preview box in the chat

autovote.description: Toggles auto upvoting for every song

chat_notifications.description: Enable desktop notifications when a user mentions you in chat

custom_css.modal_content: Enter a url location for your custom css

custom_mentions.description: Toggle using custom mentions to trigger sounds in chat
custom_mentions.modal_content: Add your custom mention triggers here (separate by comma)

custom_sound.description: Change the notification sound to a custom one.
custom_sound.modal_content: Enter the full URL of a sound file. We recommend using an .mp3 file. Leave blank to go back to Dubtrack's default sound

downdub_in_chat.description: Toggle showing downdubs in the chat box (mods only)

emotes.description: Adds twitch and bttv emotes in chat.

grabs_in_chat.description: Toggle showing grabs in the chat box

hide_avatars.description: Toggle hiding user avatars in the chat box.

pm_notifications.description: Enable desktop notifications when a user receives a private message

shows_dubs_on_hover.modal_content: Please note that this feature is currently still in development. We are waiting on the ability to pull grab vote information from Dubtrack on load. Until then the only grabs you will be able to see are those you are present in the room for.
shows_dubs_on_hover.no_updubs: No updubs have been casted yet!
shows_dubs_on_hover.no_downdubs: No downdubs have been casted yet!
shows_dubs_on_hover.no_grabs: This song hasn't been grabbed yet!

show_timestamps.description: Toggle always showing chat message timestamps.

spacebar_mute.description: Turn on/off the ability to mute current song with the spacebar.

updubs_in_chat.description: Toggle showing updubs in the chat box

warn_on_nav.description: Warns you when accidentally clicking on a link that takes you out of dubtrack.
